title: Environment's features
description:
• Configure the host name (domain name) of the server used to access the softswitch via web interface.


Ping the domain; if it is pingable and the domain resolves to the IP address assigned to the Environment, change "Web address" from IP to domain in the Environment's properties.




  • Manage the list of available graphs per environment on the Monitoring page


From version 2.1 you can enable/disable graphics and choose those your require. Below is how:
